meanings.definition: The action of putting something into something else.
meanings.sent1: The insertion of coins into the vending machine was quick and easy.
meanings.sent2: She made an insertion of a new paragraph into her essay to improve the flow.
meanings.sent3: The magician's trick involved the insertion of a rabbit into a hat.
meanings.sent4: The insertion of sunlight through the clouds brightened up the room.
meanings.sent5: The insertion of the key into the lock finally opened the door.

meanings.definition: The act of adding something into a document or text.
meanings.sent1: His insertion of a funny joke into the presentation made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent2: The insertion of a footnote at the bottom of the page clarified the reference.
meanings.sent3: The insertion of a smiley face emoji into the email added a touch of friendliness.
meanings.sent4: The insertion of a new character into the story brought an unexpected twist.
meanings.sent5: The insertion of a comma into the sentence changed its entire meaning.

meanings.definition: The process of introducing something into a body part.
meanings.sent1: The doctor performed the insertion of the needle into the patient's arm carefully.
meanings.sent2: The insertion of the thermometer into the mouth showed a normal temperature.
meanings.sent3: The insertion of the straw into the drink was followed by a refreshing sip.
meanings.sent4: The insertion of the key into the ignition started the car smoothly.
meanings.sent5: The insertion of the chip into the card reader completed the transaction.
